title: Frequently Asked Questions
content:
"Q: Is this a digital product?
A: Yes, you'll receive an instant download upon purchase.

Q: Can I request a different size or format?
A: Certainly! Just contact me before or after your purchase.

Q: Is this for commercial use?
A: No, it's intended for personal use only.

Q: Are refunds available?
A: Digital downloads are final sale, but I'll promptly resolve any issues.

Q: Is it truly limited edition?
A: Absolutely—only 25 copies will ever be available.🎨"
instructions: This is the base text for the 'Frequently Asked Questions' section for the 3x4 aspect ratio. Edit the text to refine the message for this paragraph.
